data.description: File::Find wrapper mimicing Unix find syntax
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
File::Finder more closely mimics find(1)'s syntax than does
    File::Find::Rule, and I believe it allows for the creation of
    reusable components easier, and also believe the code is cleaner and
    faster.

    The two packages can clearly co-exist, although I imagine some
    users of File::Find::Rule will appreciate File::Finder as I do.
